content: diamond cowl shown in four colors of dimond laine elmer fingering diamond cowl by jennifer evans for the lamb & kid this colorwork cowl combines a couple of our favorite things color and cashmere our elmer and elmer tweed fingering bases shine in this simple stranded pattern and just wait until you feel the fabric we think you ll really enjoy the shaping built into this piece too it falls into a cozy cashmere- forward puddle around your neck finished measurements one size 31 circumference at the bottom tapering to 22 circumference at the top x 14 high needles needles listed are suggested gauge needle us 3 3 25mm 24 circular needles you may wish to use a 16 circular needle too as you get closer to the top of your cowl tools darning needle 1 bor marker diamond cowl shown in dimond laine elmer fingering in colors gray is my favorite color gauge cookie sweatshirt and fluorange 24 stitches and 28 rounds = 4 in stockinette stitch in the round using gauge needle blocked
